body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, I'm Roger Morris from Speedy Auto Dealers. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Roger, my name is Janet Wright.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Janet. Can you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, two three four, one zero zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. And could you also share your email address with me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is jwright@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Janet. Is there anything specific you would like to know about our services today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling excited about your pricing, can you tell me more about discounts or special offers?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Certainly, we have ongoing promotions and discounts. I will provide you with all the details. Thank you for your time, Janet.
